    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    BackToStartTile
    The tile class that returns a player back to the first tile.
    Board
    This class represents the board.
    BoardFileReader
    The interface for reading json files
    BoardFileReaderGson
    This class reads jsonfile
    BoardFileWriter
    The interface for writing json files
    BoardFileWriterGson
    This class is responsible for writing a board object to a JSON file using Gson.
    BoardGameFactory
    This class is used to create different types of boards for the game.
    BoardLoader
    This class is responsible for loading a board file using a file chooser dialog.
    ChanceCard
    This interface represents a chance card in the game.
    ChanceCardFactory
    ChanceCardFactory class is responsible for creating a deck of chance cards.
    ChanceCardJail
    ChanceCardJail class represents a chance card that gives the player a "get out of jail free" card.
    ChanceCardMoney
    ChanceCardMoney class represents a chance card that affects the player's balance.
    ChanceCardMove
    ChanceCardMove is a class that represents a chance card that moves the player to a new position.
    ChanceCardTile
    This tile makes the player draw a chance card when they land on it.
    Dice
    Represents a die in the game.
    FinishTile
    The tile class that makes the finish tile.
    Game
    This class represents a game and includes the players and the board.
    GenericGameView
    a shared class for the parts of the view that are used by both games
    GoToJailTile
    Makes the player go to jail when they land on this tile.
    invalidBirthdayException
    Exception for invalid birthday.
    JailTile
    This class represents the JailTile in the game.
    LaddergameController
    The controller class handling game actions.
    LaddergameView
    This class is responsible for displaying the game board and the players in the Laddergame.
    LadderTile
    LadderTile class that extends superclass Tile.
    MenuView
    This class is responsible for creating the main menu of the application.
    MonopolyController
    The controller class for the Monopoly game.
    MonopolyView
    This class is the view for the Monopoly game.
    PauseTile
    This class creates a tile that pauses players
    Player
    Represents a player in the game.
    PlayerController
    The controller class handling player actions.
    PlayerFileReader
    This class reads player information from a CSV file.
    PlayerFileWriter
    This class writes player information to a CSV file.
    PlayerSwapTile
    This class creates a tile that swaps players
    PopupView
    This class is responsible for creating popups in the application.
    PositionChangeObserver
    This interface defines a method to observe changes in a player's position.
    Property
     
    PropertyTile
    The PropertyTile class represents a tile on the game board that is associated with a property.
    StartTile
    The StartTile class represents the start tile in the game.
    Tile
    Represents a tile in the game.
    TileAction
    The TileAction interface represents an action that can be performed on a tile in the game.
    TradeView
    This class represents the trade view in the Monopoly game.
    ViewMain
    This is the launch method for the program and the main GUI class.
